name: BitmapConversionOptions

properties.name: resolution
properties.description: The output resolution (in pixels per inch)

properties.name: patternName
properties.description: The name of the pattern to use. Valid only when 'method' = custom.

properties.name: frequency
properties.description: The number of printer dots per inch. Valid only when 'method' = halftone screen. Range: 1.0 to 999.99.

properties.name: angle
properties.description: The angle (in degrees) at which to orient individual dots. Valid only when 'method' = halftone screen. Range: -180 to 180.

properties.name: shape
properties.description: The dot shape. Valid only when 'method' = halftone screen.

description: Options for changing the document mode to Bitmap.
